Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is covered with a glossy dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a number of lines of red-painted text, partially obscured by patches of a dark-brown resinous deposit.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394726) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394726)
